member.summary: Calls delete-function for the selected item.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.SessionForm.Experiment
member.summary: The experiment data object.

member.name: T:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator
member.summary: Generates files for the Experiment Builder. It serializes the experiment objects (and its dependenants) in a file and generates the XML file for the Graphics Engine.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.generateSessionFiles(ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor)
member.summary: Generate the Session files in the specified experiment folder.
member.param: The experiment object containing all the experiment data.
member.returns: True if the file generation was succesful.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.saveExperiment(ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor,System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the experiment object in a file.
member.param: The file name for the object.
member.returns: True when the generation was succesful.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.loadExperiment(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a serialized experiment object
member.param: File name of the experiment object to load.
member.returns: The experiment object that has been loaded.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.createBMP(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Creates an image. Two shapes can be created: "Ellipse/Circles" or "Squares/Rectangle".
member.param: Either the width of the rectangle or the x-radius of the ellipse.
Either the height of the rectangle or the y-radius of the ellipse.
The foreground color for the object.
The background color of the object.(Only useful for ellipses).

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.createDefaultDir
member.summary: Creates the default Directory, if it doesn't exist.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.createSubDirs
member.summary: Creates all the subdirs, if they are not already existing.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.#ctor
member.summary: Private Constructor. Use getInstance to get an Instance of this object.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.getInstance
member.summary: Return the actual instance of the object. If no instance exists, a new one will be generated. There can be no more than one instance at a time of this object.
member.returns: The actual instance of the FileGenerator

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.DefaultDir
member.summary: The default dir where all files and folders are supposed to be generated by the Experiment Builder. Set to C:\EVS\

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.SubDir
member.summary: The list of sub directories the Exeriment Builder generates. Set to bin,doc,ext,include

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.ExperimentDir
member.summary: The directory where the experiments are stored. Set to experiments

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.SessionDirPrefix
member.summary: The Prefix for all Session Files. Set to Sess

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.PerfDir
member.summary: The folder that contains the performance files. Set to perf

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.FileGenerator.ImageSubDir
member.summary: The folder that contains the images. Set to images

member.summary: Display a pop-up window which waits for a valid name of the experiment and starts the creation process.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.NameForm.fileNameTextBox_TextChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the user enters a name for the experiment, this name is verified if it valid (That means, it is checked if the folder already exists.)

member.summary: After clicking on OK, the creation of folders and files for the experiment can be started. (In a parallel thread).

member.name: T:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor
member.summary: This class represents an object which is displayed in a trial. It contains information about its type (whether if it a rectangle, an ellipse or a BMP-File), it movement and start position etc.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.TargetObject
member.summary: Indicates whether the object is a target object or not. (E.g., if it blinks at the start of a trial)

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.Type
member.summary: Defines the type of the object. Can be either be "Rectangle/Square", "Ellipse/Circle" or "Bitmap File".

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.Filename
member.summary: If the type is "Bitmap File", the path to the File can be defined here.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.Width
member.summary: If the object is of type "Rectangle/Square" or "Ellipse/Circle", the width/x-radius can be set here.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.Height
member.summary: If the object is of type "Rectangle/Square" or "Ellipse/Circle", the height/y-radius can be set here.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.Color
member.summary: If the object is of type "Rectangle/Square" or "Ellipse/Circle", the color of the object can be set here.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.MinSpeedVertical
member.summary: Defines the minimum speed for vertical movements of the object.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.MaxSpeedVertical
member.summary: Defines the maximum speed for vertical movements of the object.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.MinSpeedHorizontal
member.summary: Defines the minimum speed for horizontal movements of the object.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.MaxSpeedHorizontal
member.summary: Defines the maximum speed for horizontal movement of the object.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.MObjectDescriptor.StartPanel
member.summary: Defines, in which area of the screen (e.g, upper right/left, bottom right/left corner). Possible values are either 1, 2, 3 or 4.

member.name: T:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor
member.summary: Contains information about the experiment and the a list of all session. To make life easier, there is only one Session per Experiment.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.SessionList
member.summary: The SessionList property contains the session belonging to the experiment. It can contain only one session. (But could be easily extended to a list later.)

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.DisplayX
member.summary: The width in pixel of the resolution for the experiment.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.DisplayY
member.summary: The height in pixel of the resolution for the experiment.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.NumberSessionFiles
member.summary: How many session files the Experiment Builder is supposed to generate

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.ExperimentFolder
member.summary: The folder where the experiments files are generated.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.ExperimentFileName
member.summary: The file name of the experiment.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.ExperimentName
member.summary: The name of the experiment.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.ExperimentDescriptor.NumberTrials
member.summary: How many trials all sessions are containingl

member.name: T:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor
member.summary: This class is a representant for a block of trials. It stores informations like duration, number of Trials, Trial name, Background Color etc. for each block of trials. Also it contains a list of all Objects belonging to the trial.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.Duration
member.summary: The duration for each trial in this trial block. The value will store seconds.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.NumberTrials
member.summary: The number of trials this block contains.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.TrialName
member.summary: The (hopefully) unique name to identify this trial block later in the EyeTracker generated data files.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The background color for this block of trials.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.ForegroundColor
member.summary: The foreground color - in this color components of the experiments like the fixation marker or the grid are painted.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.FixationMarker
member.summary: Indicates whether a fixation marker should be displayed or not.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.GridDisplayHorizontal
member.summary: Indicates whether a horizontal grid should be displayed or not.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.GridDisplayVertical
member.summary: Indicates whether a vertical grid should be displayed or not.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.Bouncing
member.summary: Indicates if the objects should bounce off from each other.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.BouncingDistance
member.summary: Distance in pixels the objects should bounce off from each other (if the bouncing property is set.)

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.StartingDistance
member.summary: The minimum distance in pixels objects should be away from each other at the start of an experiment

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.NumberObjects
member.summary: The number of objects this trial block contains.

member.name: P:ExperimentBuilder.TrialDescriptor.MObjectList
member.summary: The List which contains all objects for this trial block.

member.name: M:ExperimentBuilder.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
